title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 225 - Fuel Composition And Use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 225 - Fuel Composition And Use

State Regulations

Subpart 225-1 - FUEL COMPOSITION AND USE-SULFUR LIMITATIONS (§ 225-1.1 to 225-1.8)

Subpart 225-2 - Fuel Composition and Use-Waste Oil as a Fuel (§ 225-2.1 to 225-2.8)

Subpart 225-3 - Fuel Composition and Use-Gasoline (§ 225-3.1 to 225-3.10)

Subpart 225-4 - Motor Vehicle Diesel Fuel (§ 225-4.1 to 225-4.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 225

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 71-2103, 71-
2105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
